channel.title: How to I view/edit/makeanew .idx and .dat files?
channel.description:
Hey guys!
Well I'm trying to work with my servers Game Frame but the server I'm using (Quality +) has a lot of the stuff to change the gameframe inside a custom .dat/.idx file called Media (not to be confused with media.jag). What I was wondering is how do I open/edit/make a new .dat and .idx file so I can replace some sprites with my own? Thank! :D

item.title: How to I view/edit/makeanew .idx and .dat files?
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

use Tom’s cache suit or some program like that
